scripts.start: AGENTS=${AGENTS:-2}  BOOTSTRAP_PORT=$(port) SIGNAL_PORT=$(port) npm run network
scripts.network: hc s clean && npm run build:happ && UI_PORT=8888 concurrently "npm start -w ui" "npm run launch:happ" "holochain-playground"
scripts.test: npm run build:zomes && hc app pack workdir --recursive && npm t -w tests
scripts.test:ui: npm run build:zomes && hc app pack workdir --recursive && npm t -w ui
scripts.test:ping: npm run build:zomes && hc app pack workdir --recursive && npm t --filter ping -w tests
scripts.test:profiles: npm run build:zomes && hc app pack workdir --recursive && npm t --filter profiles -w tests
scripts.start:tauri: AGENTS=${AGENTS:-2}  BOOTSTRAP_PORT=$(port) SIGNAL_PORT=$(port) npm run network:tauri
scripts.network:tauri: hc s clean && npm run build:happ && UI_PORT=8888 concurrently "npm start -w ui" "npm run launch:tauri" "holochain-playground"
scripts.launch:tauri: concurrently "hc run-local-services --bootstrap-port $BOOTSTRAP_PORT --signal-port $SIGNAL_PORT" "echo pass | RUST_LOG=warn hc launch --piped -n $AGENTS workdir/requests_and_offers.happ --ui-port $UI_PORT network --bootstrap http://127.0.0.1:"$BOOTSTRAP_PORT" webrtc ws://127.0.0.1:"$SIGNAL_PORT""
scripts.package: npm run build:happ && npm run package -w ui && hc web-app pack workdir --recursive
scripts.build:happ: npm run build:zomes && hc app pack workdir --recursive
scripts.download-hrea: npm run download-facets && npm run download-hrea-obs && npm run download-hrea-specification && npm run download-hrea-agent && npm run download-hrea-planning && npm run download-hrea-plan && npm run download-hrea-agreement
scripts.clean:hrea-modules: rimraf workdir/hrea_observation.dna; rimraf workdir/hrea_specification.dna; rimraf workdir/hrea_agent.dna; rimraf workdir/hrea_planning.dna; rimraf workdir/hrea_proposal.dna; rimraf workdir/hrea_plan.dna; rimraf workdir/hrea_agreement.dna
